#sight #semihistorical #japan #type87

another optic of Meiya from Muv-Luv because i'm mentally handicapped. I don't actually remember making most of this optic, it just happened and i'm not getting the 2 hours back. It's not perfect, it's definitely not getting more than like two downloads, but i made it i guess. Call me obscene names in the comments if there's any way I can make future optics better.

3 files with names you should be able to figure out, and a JSON file for WTDraw in case i fucked up and made the files too big or too small for your weird niche tank with a zoom that it and one other vehicle in the game has.

#a...

It's a nice sight, made it for myself but you can use it if you wanna. The horisontal notches are not there for a reason i just liked how they looked, no distance numbers either on the notches so it is recommended to use on a tank with low bullet-drop or that you got the feeling for the drop-off already.

#nice #simple #all_tanks #universal

Kasumi Meta Gunsight!

It's my first gunsight I have ever created, it took me 3 day's with learning how to make the gunsight and many troublesome mistakes

There is 2 version's, Regular and Small

I hope everyone likes it! if there is any improvement's please suggest it below!

カスミのメタガンサイト！

これは私が初めて作ったガンサイトで、作り方を覚えるのに3日かかりました
レギュラーとスモールの2種類があります

みんな気に入ってくれるといいな！ 何か改善点があれば、以下に提案してほしい！

#anime #kasumimeta #azurlane

Battlefield 2042 sights

Includes 2 sizes for dot.

#battlefield

update: Simple Sight V3.1
- added 0 meter for arc shot
- fixed black pixel in center dot


Simple Sight V3

installation:
1. extract UserSight folder into war thunder directory
2. apply under Option > Ground vehicles battle settings > sight settings > reticle

the one with range indicator is for non-laser rangefinder or low velocity shell

based on: https://live.warthunder.com/post/1101996/en/

Sights for modern vehicles. V.2 (Experimental)

This pack includes some variations not shown in pictures.
Also in README you can find a way how to delete the circles if you dont like them

The horizontal lines next to the centre of your screen move up when you start zeroing. It has no ranges so use these sights only with laser rangefinder.

Also in "Sight settings" add custom Rangefinder because the scaling from different zooms means I cannot place them in a good position. While the ingame custom rangefinder is perfect for that.

#universal #all_tanks #mbt

Yuuri sight from Girls last tour

you can order sights, I'll try to do my best! (free)

#yuuri #girlslasttour #glt #girls_last_tour #anime

==== Happy new years guys~ ====

Sights for German/Italian 105/120mm guns and some of USSR 125mm guns. Using with (laser) rangefinders is recommended.

Features:
- Reticles for shooting static targets while moving, which can also be used to shoot moving targets while staying still.
- A clean design for less-painful searching and aiming.

Available for Vehicles:

  • Leopard 1s, Leopard 2s, Radkampfwagen 90, OF-40, ... most of Ger&Ita vehicles 105/120mm guns using 4~12X or 8~16X sights (Generic sights named like "...

Sight with AMX-10 M made by Daebom, with 3 size as allways.

All credit to daebom for the original art. Link to his channel since I can't find the video anymore : https://www.youtube.com/@daebom/videos

If you have any request, ask me in the comment.

#anime #daebom
